law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 248, effective January 1, 1989. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 114, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 59, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 38. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 48.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Liability of directors in certain cases.
